text: Futsal Project Halle-Gooik is a Belgian futsal team playing in the Belgian Futsal Division 1. The club was founded in 2004. They debuted a women's team for the 2019/20 season. ==Current squad== {| border=1 style="border- collapse:collapse; font-size:90%;" cellpadding=3 cellspacing=0 width=30% |- bgcolor=#C1D8FF !width=2%|# !width=5%|Position !width=10%|Name !width=5%|Nationality |- align=center |12 | Goalkeeper | Cristiano Marques | |- align=center |22 | Goalkeeper | Tiago Van Beeck | |- align=center |90 | Goalkeeper | Bram Meyers | |- align=center |6 | Defender | Eduardo | |- align=center |7 | Defender | Dragan Tomić | |- align=center |15 | Defender | Matteo Cordier | |- align=center |17 | Defender | Rafael Teixeira | |- align=center |10 | Winger | Tiago De Bail | |- align=center |11 | Winger | Leo | |- align=center |19 | Winger | Diogo | |- align=center |21 | Winger | Gabriel Gréllo | |- align=center |24 | Winger | Jonas Pinto | |- align=center |8 | Pivot | Alessandro Patias | |- align=center |9 | Pivot | Jovan Lazarević | |- align=center |20 | Pivot | Franko Jelovčić | |- align=center |} ==Honours== ===Domestic=== * Division 1 (5): 2014/15, 2015/16, 2016/17, 2017/18, 2018/19 * Belgian Cup (4): 2014/15, 2015/16, 2017/18, 2018/19 ** Belgian Cup runners-up (1): 2016/17 ==References== ==External links== * Official site * Futsal Champions League page Category:Futsal clubs in Belgium Category:Futsal clubs established in 2004 Category:2004 establishments in Belgium
